title: GND Subject's Specifications
description: The document records the details of a GND subject with relevant attributes needed for the shared task

Code.description: GND subject code in the format: gnd:<Identifier> - Code 021 - Field: 2 and a

Classification Number.description: Subject classification number - Code: 065 - Field: a

Name.description: Subject Name, topical term - Code: 150 - Field: a

Alternate Name.description: The synonyms/aternate names for this subject - Code: 450 - Field: a

Related Subjects.description: Related subjects names or subdivision record to trace - Code: 550 - Field: a

Source URL.description: Source citation - Uniform Resource Identifier - Code: 670 - Field: u

Definition.description: A formal definition of the subject - Code: 677 - Field: a
